statements: SELECT * FROM robot_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, performance_metric_value FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE robot_id = '87654321';
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE performance_metric_name LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_value as value FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT performance_metric_name FROM robot_performance_metrics ORDER BY performance_metric_name ASC;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE performance_metric_value > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT performance_metric_name, AVG(performance_metric_value) AS avg_value FROM robot_performance_metrics GROUP BY performance_metric_name HAVING avg_value > 0.7
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND performance_metric_name LIKE '%accuracy%' ORDER BY performance_metric_value ASC
SELECT DISTINCT performance_metric_name FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE robot_id = 'b3e7df57-3f4d-4d3b-bc6b-d798870522b7'
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, MAX(performance_metric_value) AS max_value FROM robot_performance_metrics GROUP BY robot_id, performance_metric_name HAVING max_value < 1.0
SELECT * FROM RobotMetrics WHERE robot_id = '976ccf1b-0dfe-43bd-a201-3e9c6b9586a9';
SELECT performance_metric_name, metric_value FROM RobotMetrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM RobotEvents WHERE event_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM RobotEvents WHERE robot_id = 'bfa8b807-3be6-4ec3-a167-063b6fd287ce';
SELECT robot_id, capture_timestamp FROM RobotMetrics WHERE capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM RobotMetrics WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT performance_metric_name, metric_value FROM RobotMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM RobotEvents WHERE event_type IN ('error', 'warning') ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, metric_value, capture_timestamp FROM RobotMetrics JOIN RobotEvents ON RobotMetrics.robot_id = RobotEvents.robot_id WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM RobotMetrics WHERE capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RobotMetrics
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name FROM RobotMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT metric_value FROM RobotMetrics WHERE robot_id = 1
SELECT * FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT robot_id, configuration_name, configuration_value FROM RobotConfigurations ORDER BY configuration_name ASC
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM RobotMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT configuration_name, configuration_value FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT error_id, robot_id, error_message FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_id > 100 ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotMetrics WHERE robot_id = 2 AND performance_metric_name LIKE '%CPU%' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) as total_errors FROM RobotErrors GROUP BY robot_id HAVING total_errors > 5 ORDER BY total_errors DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM robots ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, performance_score FROM robots WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT MAX(performance_score) AS max_performance FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, error_timestamp, error_description FROM robot_errors WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, performance_score FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM robots WHERE performance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 100 ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT robot_name, error_timestamp, error_description FROM robots JOIN robot_errors ON robots.robot_id = robot_errors.robot_id;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM robots JOIN maintenance_logs ON robots.robot_id = maintenance_logs.robot_id WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, performance_metric_value FROM robots_performance_metrics;
SELECT robot_id, status, battery_level, timestamp FROM robot_status;
SELECT robot_id, mission_id, distance_travelled, time_taken FROM robot_history;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, start_time, end_time FROM mission_logs;
SELECT error_id, timestamp, error_message, robot_id FROM robot_errors;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric_name, performance_metric_value, timestamp FROM robots_performance_metrics WHERE performance_metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, status, battery_level, timestamp FROM robot_status WHERE status = 'Active' AND battery_level < 30 ORDER BY battery_level ASC;
SELECT robot_id, mission_id, distance_travelled, time_taken, timestamp FROM robot_history WHERE distance_travelled > 1000 AND time_taken < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, start_time, end_time, status FROM mission_logs WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT error_id, timestamp, error_message, robot_id FROM robot_errors WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
